# format(_:)

**Instance Method**

Formats a value, using this style.

## Declaration

```swift
func format(_ value: Self.FormatInput) -> Self.FormatOutput
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The value to format.

## Return Value

A representation of `value`, in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FormatStyle/FormatOutput] type, formatted according to the style’s configuration.

## Discussion

Use this method when you want to create a single style instance, and then use it to format multiple values.
